message: I quickly glance up at Noiz's face, but he's just looking down at me, completely calm.
His face is swollen from my punches, too, but he hardly seems to notice.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That... didn't hurt?"
Noiz doesn't say a word. His face doesn't betray anything either.
Man... He was like this last time, too.
He didn't seem to notice when he burned his hand on the coffee.
At first, I thought he was just acting tough, or maybe that he had a really high pain tolerance, but this? No one could ignore getting kneed in the balls.
Plus, when he was hitting me back, I didn't really feel any anger from him.
Normally, I'd expect him to feel rage or something...
But there isn't any of that with Noiz. He never hesitates, either. His behavior is almost... mechanical.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It doesn't hurt?"
Noiz glares at me icily.
His voice is colder than I've ever heard it before.

name: ノイズ
message: "Nothing hurts. Not being punched, kicked, stabbed. Nothing."

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't feel pain."

name: 蒼葉
message: "At all?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Or much of anything else―except for my tongue. I can feel pressure, I guess, but that's it. It's like being wrapped in a thick layer of rubber."

name: ノイズ
message: "That's why I told you I don't need first aid or anything."

name: ノイズ
message: "My wounds heal fine on their own. That's how I've always handled it."

name: ノイズ
message: "But you're not like me. You feel pain, don't you? That's why I don't get why you'd do something like that."

name: ノイズ
message: "Why you'd risk getting hurt to―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's there not to get, dumbass?"
I interrupt Noiz with a light slap across the cheek.
At first, I was surprised to hear that he couldn't feel pain.
So surprised that it took me some time to understand.
But as I listened to Noiz describe it so calmly...
I started to feel... sad.
He can't feel pain. Can't understand pain.
Because of that, what else can't he understand?

Pain is how people come to understand each other.

Hurting others... being hurt in turn... Through pain, through reflecting on what causes pain, we learn how better to interact, how better to solve our problems.
But he can't do that, can he?
Because he can't feel pain, he can't understand the pain of others.
That's why my actions are so mysterious to him.
Someone helping him purely out of concern, without any ulterior motive...
That's beyond what he can imagine. In his mind, there has to be a reason. No wonder he assumed I was after his body and stuff.
It makes him seem almost... childlike.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, what a stupid thing to say. Even if it doesn't hurt, you still bleed. You can still die."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You don't feel pain, so you don't need help? What kind of dumbass bullshit is that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're right, I did get hurt when I saved your ass. But I'm glad I did it. A little scratch is nothing compared to that."

name: ノイズ
message: "'Cause you'd feel responsible if I died. And it'd make getting to Toue harder."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. Why are you such a fucking cynic? It's not about who's responsible. I'd have saved you either way."

name: ノイズ
message: "So you did it 'cause you wanna fuck me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Would you knock it off with that already? That's not why. ...I don't know if I can explain this in a way you'll understand."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I just... wanted to help you. The same reason I bandaged your hand. That's why I knocked you out of the way of that beam."

name: ノイズ
message: "That doesn't make sense."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, well, people don't make sense. You might not feel pain, but I don't like seeing you hurt. So I'm gonna help you whether you like it or not."

name: ノイズ
message: "Are you stupid?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're one to talk."

name: ノイズ
message: "You're not getting anything out of it. It's just a waste of time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So what? I don't think it's a waste. I guess you could say I am being selfish, since I'm just doing what I want."

name: ノイズ
message: "What if I tell you to stop?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not a chance. I don't give a shit what you want. I'm doing it no matter how much you complain."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If that annoys you, then why don't you try considering my feelings for once? Then maybe I'll consider yours."
Noiz goes silent. I quickly grow restless, wondering if I said something strange.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Do you realize what you just said?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Asking me to 'consider your feelings?' I don't think I've ever met a guy who could say shit like that with a straight face."
...It did sound pretty corny. I turn away, my face suddenly on fire.

name: ノイズ
message: "You're turning red."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up."

name: ノイズ
message: "...No one's ever tried this hard with me before."

name: ノイズ
message: "People always either keep their distance, or try to use me for my body or my money."
I turn back to him. His voice is softer than before, and where before his expression was flat and robotic, now it is tinged with confusion.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Your money? What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "My parents are loaded."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're rich?"

name: ノイズ
message: "My parents are. But I never gave a shit about people like that, or anyone else for that matter. So I'd kick their asses, and then I'd get in trouble."

name: ノイズ
message: "I was always getting in trouble, ever since I was a kid. I can't feel pain, so I don't know when to stop. I kept crossing the line."

name: ノイズ
message: "So I'd make some kid cry, their parents would yell at my parents, and my parents would tell me what a disappointment I was."

name: ノイズ
message: "Eventually, they locked me up in my room and told me to stay away from other people."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's awful..."

name: ノイズ
message: "At least it was a nice room. An apartment, really. I had a tutor, and maids to bring me food and shit."

name: ノイズ
message: "No one else came to see me, though, so whenever I got hurt, I dealt with it myself."

name: ノイズ
message: "In the beginning, I was so lonely I'd cry myself to sleep, but then I got used to being alone."

name: ノイズ
message: "I told myself I didn't need anyone. I could take care of myself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But... that's not true, is it?"
I mean, if I'd grown up in circumstances like his, I'd probably have turned out the same way.
Forced to live alone, with no one to call a friend...
Eventually, you'd get used to living like that. You wouldn't even question why.
Noiz speaks about it very matter-of-factly now, but he must have suffered horribly when he was a child.
After being treated like that by your parents... you'd have to convince yourself you were fine alone just to survive.

name: ノイズ
message: "Lemme ask you something. If, hypothetically, I were to 'consider your feelings,' what would I get out of it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...First off, you really need to stop treating everything like business. But let's say it is. I'll make sure you're satisfied."

name: ノイズ
message: "Got anything to back that up?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nah."
